code: import*as axios from'axios';var instance=axios.create({baseURL:'https://api.staging.lxpia.com/api'});instance.interceptors.request.use(function(config){config.headers.authorization="Bearer ".concat(localStorage.usertoken);return config;});export var userApi={login:function login(email,password){return instance.post("/users/authenticate",{email:email,password:password}).then(function(respnose){return respnose.data;});},getProfile:function getProfile(token){return instance.post("/users/authToken/?token=".concat(token)).then(function(response){return response.data;});}};export var coursesApi={getCourses:function getCourses(organizationId,page,take){return instance.get("courses?organizationId=".concat(organizationId,"&page=").concat(page,"&take=").concat(take)).then(function(response){return response.data;});}};export var activitiesApi={getActivities:function getActivities(employeeId,userId,organizationId){return instance.get("activities/byLearner?employeeId=".concat(employeeId,"&userId=").concat(userId,"&organizationId=").concat(organizationId)).then(function(response){return response.data;});}};
